name: Race in Desert
description:
Welcome back car lovers!

Race in the Desert is a racing game where your mission is to pass each mission which will not be easy at all, because you'll encounter quite difficult obstacles.

Convince yourself by trying at least one race with the craziest drivers who risk their lives doing all kinds of stunts.

Choose the car that suits you and start right now to win the eyes of the public. Nothing compares to a powerful gasoline engine, right? Then, we invite you to press the accelerator pedal to really feel these crazy emotions!
Game features :
- Daily Bonus
- 12 cars
- 3 Game Modes ( Single / Racing / Cop Chase)
- A lot of missions
